content: the pattern is for a basic granny square with instructions on making an afghan a lap throw a tote a scarf and a jacket tote 1 skein each 303 painted desert print ca and 334 buff cb the pattern is no longer available on michaels site but is available in the web archives 1 1 http //web archive org/web/20080421224613/http //www michaels com/art/online/projectsheet pid=e04699
